marklogic.body: Your comment speaks more to the shortcomings of the human medical care professionals. They write their losses, passing Off the costs to the taxpayers, premium payers, and paying customers. As an ER veterinarian, I deal with inability to pay all the time. It is a Cold hard fact of life. I have "wiggle room" to try to make things happen for life threatening emergencies, but this is at the discretion of my boss. Maybe one day, I will have the luxury of driving a business of my own into the ground with a squeaky clean conscience. Till then, I'm gonna save up for the beamer....wink, wink. And btw, I consider my pets part of my family. I would beg, borrow, and steal (yah...I'd rob you) to treat even minor ailments in them. I would not make it your problem....other than the robbing.
